## HAPNodeJSClient

Homebridge plugin to allow control via Alexa devices

### Parameters

-   `options`  
-   `pin` **[String][4]** Homebridge PIN
-   `refreh` **[String][4]** Discovery refresh interval in seconds
-   `debug` **[String][4]** Enable DEBUG module

### Examples

```javascript
sample
{
  "pin": "031-45-154",
  "refresh": 900,
  "debug": true
}
```
